description: Use a regular expression to split an input_string into multiple items.

inputs.description: The regular expression to use to split the string. Reserved regular expression characters should be escaped with a backslash, so '\.' will match '.' and '\\\\' will match '\'.
inputs.name: regex

inputs.description: Either True or False to indicate whether or not to remove whitespace before and after each item. Defaults to True
inputs.name: strip_whitespace

outputs.description: A list of items created by splitting the input string.
